summary: Skirtless variant of the Male Dragonbone (Dragon Plate) Armor
descriptionHtml:
This is a REPLACER for existing meshes/textures ... You have been warned!

A Non-Replacer version MAY be forthcoming, after I do all of the male armors in game I can.

Continuing my \"Skirtless Male Armors\" theme of mods

Hide = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23579
Iron = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23665
Bandit= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23670
Nord Plate = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23669
Daedric = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23703
Ancient Nord = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23754


Basically my DOV don\'t wear skirts!

So I decided to try and create a \"pants\" version of the male armors.
Where possible I tried to use existing textures and keep the theme/style the same, and where not possible, I created the textures from scratch (like all of the normal maps!!!)

This (along with the Dragon Scale) was one of the hardest to do because I had to create a realistic looking texture for the pants. I tried to make them appear the same as the \"Dragon skin\" parts of the torso and AFAIK It doesn\'t look too bad ...

The textures are not \"High Def\" and please don\'t ask for for a \"HD\" version, but they are as detailed and as close to the original textures as I can make them.
If someone wants to create a HD version, feel free.

I\'m slowly going through all the armors and, where possible, doing the same thing, so there should be more coming, please be patient if your want \"xxx\" armor with no skirt.

I also DO NOT have any skills with Blender or MAX so these are done purely with Nifskope and Paint.net, which means I probably won\'t be able to \"Add this, take out that, put that there and swap that for this\" But if you do have a request you can still post it and I MAY be able to do it.

These are MALE ONLY, as I feel there is already enough female variants out there, but If I get enough requests I MAY try and do something similar for the female version.

There may be some minor clipping errors here and there with certain animations, I haven\'t tested these out exhaustively in game, but in most situations they seem to work OK

!!! Again, Any bugs or major issues PLEASE let me know POLITELY, and I\'ll try and sort them out !!!

For the SS I used vanilla assets, except I used one of the \"clean\" skin textures (can\'t remember which one, but there aren\'t that many for male bodies so ...)
